name.name: A probabilistic subcortical atlas for PD

software.description:
This atlas takes advantage of ultra-high resolution 7T MRI to provide unprecedented levels of detail on structures of the basal ganglia in-vivo. The atlas includes a disease-specific probability map of the subthalamic Nucleus based on Parkinson's Disease patients.

When using these masks please cite: Anneke Alkemade, Gilles de Hollander, Max C Keuken, Andreas Schäfer, Derek VM Ott, Johannes Schwarz, David Weise, Sonja A Kotz, Birte U Forstmann (2017). Comparison of T2* and QSM contrasts in Parkinson’s disease to visualize the STN with MRI. PLOS one
